title: Evolutionary Instructional Design for Enhancing Microbial Biosynthetic Resistance

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for in-service professionals to optimize microbial biosynthesis processes.

learning_goals: Evolutionary approaches can analyze microbial cell membrane composition changes and explain resistance mechanisms
Biosynthesis process design strategies can be established based on carboxylic acid-resistant strain development cases
Protocols can be developed to comparatively evaluate experimental results on improving tolerance to various organic acids and alcohol derivatives
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
